Docs.summary: A Class representing a SqlPoolBlobAuditingPolicy along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetSqlPoolBlobAuditingPolicyResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetSqlPoolBlobAuditingPolicy method.
